languages.text: {n}Вы замечаете, как один из гемункулов косится на отверстие в потолке. На лице ксеноса расцветает гримаса ярости. Тервантьяс не в состоянии скрыть свое бешенство из-за того, что произошло — кто-то очень, очень сильно вывел его из себя неизвестным вам поступком.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы замечаете, как один из гемункулов косится на отверстие в потолке. На лице ксеноса расцветает гримаса ярости. Тервантьяс не в состоянии скрыть свое бешенство из-за того, что произошло — кто-то очень, очень сильно вывел его из себя неизвестным вам поступком.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

languages.text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы замечаете, как один из гемункулов косится на отверстие в потолке. На лице ксеноса расцветает гримаса ярости. Тервантьяс не в состоянии скрыть свое бешенство из-за того, что произошло — кто-то очень, очень сильно вывел его из себя неизвестным вам поступком.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did that and whatever it was that they did, it infuriated him a lot.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did that and whatever it was that they did, it infuriated him a lot.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

traits.locale_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

languages.text: {n}你注意到，其中一个血伶人死死地盯着天花板上的洞，表情扭曲。看得出来，特万提亚斯无法掩饰自己的愤怒。虽然不知道是什么人做了什么事情，但很显然，这让他怒不可遏。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你注意到，其中一个血伶人死死地盯着天花板上的洞，表情扭曲。看得出来，特万提亚斯无法掩饰自己的愤怒。虽然不知道是什么人做了什么事情，但很显然，这让他暴怒不已。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

languages.text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass einer der Haemonculi zu dem Loch in der Decke hochsieht. Zorn verzerrt das Gesicht des Xenos. Tervantias kann seinen Ärger darüber, was geschehen ist, nicht verbergen. Wer das auch war und was er auch getan hat, es hat ihn erzürnt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bemerkst, dass einer der Haemonculi zu dem Loch in der Decke hochsieht. Zorn verzerrt das Gesicht des Xenos. Tervantias kann seinen Ärger darüber, was geschehen ist, nicht verbergen. Wer das auch war und was er auch getan hat, es hat Tervantias gewaltig erzürnt.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

languages.text: {n}Ves que uno de los hemónculos mira de soslayo al agujero del techo. El rostro del xenos se contrae en una mueca de ira. Tervantias es incapaz de ocultar su rabia por lo sucedido. Quienquiera que haya hecho lo que sea eso, es evidente que le enfadó mucho.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves que uno de los hemónculos mira de soslayo al agujero del techo. El rostro del xenos se contrae en una mueca de ira. Tervantias es incapaz de ocultar su rabia por lo sucedido. Quienquiera que haya hecho lo que sea eso, es evidente que le enfadó mucho.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

languages.text: {n}L'un des hémoncules jette un coup d'œil au trou dans le plafond et une grimace de colère déforme son visage. Ce qu'il s'est passé ici provoque une telle fureur chez Tervantias qu'il est incapable de la dissimuler. Qui que soit le responsable et quoi que celui-ci ait fait, l'hémoncule ne s'en est toujours pas remis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des hémoncules jette un coup d'œil au trou dans le plafond et une grimace de colère déforme son visage. Ce qu'il s'est passé ici provoque une telle fureur chez Tervantias qu'il est incapable de la dissimuler. Qui que soit le responsable et quoi que celui-ci ait fait, l'hémoncule ne s'en est toujours pas remis.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスが天井の穴を見ているのに気づく。怒りが異種族の顔を歪める。テルヴァンティアスは起こった出来事に対して怒りを隠せない。誰がやったにせよ、何をしたにせよ、彼を激怒させた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスが天井の穴を見ているのに気づく。怒りが異種族の顔を歪める。テルヴァンティアスは起こった出来事に対して怒りを隠せない。誰がやったにせよ、何をしたにせよ、彼を激怒させた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1

languages.text: {n}Haimonkuluslardan birinin tavandaki deliğe baktığını fark ediyorsun. Zenonun yüzü hiddetle çarpılıyor. Tervantias, olanlar karşısında öfkesini dizginleyemiyor. Burada her kim, ne yapmışsa onu epey sinirlendirdiği belli.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You notice one of the Haemonculi glance at the hole in the ceiling. Fury contorts the xenos's face. Tervantias is unable to hide his anger at what happened. Whoever did it and whatever it was they did, it enraged him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkuluslardan birinin tavandaki deliğe baktığını fark ediyorsun. Zenonun yüzü hiddetle çarpılıyor. Tervantias, olanlar karşısında öfkesini dizginleyemiyor. Burada her kim, ne yapmışsa onu epey sinirlendirdiği belli.{/n}
traits.speaker: HaemonculusClone1
